mapper.select: select u.userid, u.nickname, a.area_name as first_area_name, b.area_name as second_area_name, u.content, gur.cnt from user_info u join area a on u.first_area = a.area_code join area b on u.second_area = b.area_code left join ( select userid, count(group_role_no) as cnt from group_user_role where userid = 'testuser' and group_role_no = 1 group by group_role_no )gur on u.userid = gur.userid where u.userid = 'testuser'

select u.userid, ic.s_catename from user_info u join user_interest ui on u.userid = ui.userid join interest_category ic on ui.s_catecode = ic.s_catecode where u.userid = 'testuser' order by ic.s_catename
select u.userid, gi.group_name from user_info u join group_user_role gur on u.userid = gur.userid join group_info gi on gur.group_no = gi.group_no where u.userid = 'testuser' order by gi.group_name
mapper.update: update user_info set enabled = 0 where userid = 'testuser'
